_comment: This file is not meant to be changed, unless you are modifying the profile manager for a different modpack. To change settings, edit the prefs.json file instead. Values in this file are default values and should not be changed.

misc._comment: This only works with the Official Minecraft Launcher. Path relative to main AU3/EXE.

compatibility._comment: These settings help maintain compatibility with third-party / older launchers.
